Related repos

  • Parses song structures and transcribes lyrics with timestamps
  • Terminal YouTube Music player
  • Generates songs with vocals and instrumentals from text prompts or audio references
  • Generate music from text prompts locally
  • cross-platform music player with playlists, synced lyrics, and material design

  • Transcribes and translates audio offline using Whisper on your computer
  • open-source AI turns lyrics into full-length songs with vocals and instruments
